active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the consequences of bypassing organization-approved change processes in a cloud migration scenario. Reference NIST CM-3 and SA-10, and propose mitigation strategies. What trade-offs exist between speed and security?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in NIST-aligned content. Topic: Organization-Approved Change Implementation (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security Architecture And Engineering > Information System Lifecycle > Development and Implementation > Developer Configuration Management (SA-10) > Organization-Approved Change Implementation). Use the provided research context, completed with NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 5 controls: SA-10 (developer config mgmt, implement only approved changes, testing); CM-3 (config change control); CM-6 (config settings); CM-7 (least functionality); CM-8 (inventory); CM-9 (config plan). Sources: NIST SP 800-53r5 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-53r5.pdf); NIST SP 800-160 Vol. 1 (https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-160v1r1.pdf). Incorporate these EXACT learning objectives, active learning ideas for context, scaffolding layers (including prior knowledge), and flashcard schema. Generate 50 high-quality flashcards progressing through scaffolding layers and Bloom's levels. Ensure pedagogical depth: active recall, spaced repetition friendly, distractors per protocol. Output ONLY in JSON array of objects, each: {'front': 'Question', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'source': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'related_objective': '#1-6'}}. Balance: 20% recall, 40% MCQ (with 4 options, label correct), 40% higher-order. Make questions challenging yet fair, grounded in real-world cybersecurity scenarios.
